statements: DELETE FROM criminals WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
DELETE FROM crimes WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM criminals WHERE age >= 30 AND gender = 'M'
DELETE FROM security_logs WHERE user_id = 5 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM criminals WHERE criminal_id = 101 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM criminal_photos WHERE photo_id = 500 OR criminal_id = 201;
DELETE FROM sightings WHERE location = 'City Park';
